txt.en:
'Gormal tells me that you will attempt to slay the drake-queen. A noble quest, and I wish you good hunting, but killing the drake-queen will only bring temporary reprieve.

'If left unchecked, her brood of eggs will hatch, and one of her drakelings will grow to take her place. You should destroy her eggs and make sure that nothing exists to inherit her legacy as the Scourge of Urugarth.

'Continue on your quest to Urugarth. It lies to the west.'
'The eggs are destroyed? That is good. The young drakes are not as powerful as the queen, but they are just as vicious and evil.'
'Go into Urugarth and destroy the eggs of the drake-queen.'
The drake-queen rules the wilds of Urugarth, spawning broods of drakelings that ravage the countryside.
The drake-queen and her brood of eggs lies in Urugarth to the west of Tármunn Sûrsa.\n\nEsmë advised you to destroy the eggs of the drake-queen.
Esmë is at Tármunn Súrsa, east of Urugarth.\n\nYou should return to Esmë with news of your success.
